product_name: The North Face McMurdo Down Parka - Boys'
long_description: The North Face McMurdo jacket uses rugged fabric for durability and down insulation for superior warmth. HyVent(R) waterproof, breathable technology uses a multilayer polyurethane coating for waterproof protection and durability. Fully taped seams create the ultimate seal against wind and snow. Extremely sturdy nylon faille weave shell with a smooth nylon taffeta lining slides on easily over layers. The North Face McMurdo jacket is insulated with quality 550-fill-power goose down for warmth, light weight and compressibility. Detachable, insulated hood with zip-off faux fur trim adds warmth and style. Plenty of storage in double-compartment hand pockets, 2 exterior stash pockets and internal electronics pocket. 1-hand-adjustable cinch cords at waist and hem, and insulated stormflap backing zipper keep cold air out.
short_description: The North Face McMurdo jacket uses rugged fabric for durability and down insulation for superior warmth.
subcategory: Rainwear And Outerwear -- Boys And Girls
